title: LCPC AI maintains an innovative and sustainable approach to developing blockchain technology, and discusses the future prospects of blockchain

title: AI poses threat to journalism in Japan, news association chair says
description: Japan’s publishers are concerned about the impact generative artificial intelligence is having on the news business, Shiro Nakamura said.
content: Generative artificial intelligence poses a threat to journalistic integrity and the business of journalism, said the chair of the prominent Asahi Shimbun, one of the Japanese media outlets suing U.S. startup Perplexity AI over copyright infringement.... [508 chars]

title: Video podcasts become next streaming battleground
description: YouTube even offers audio show producers the ability to generate video using artificial intelligence to better illustrate their show on the platform.
content:
NEW YORK: Big tech platforms, including TikTok and Netflix, are all looking to add video podcasts to their content, a rapidly growing format that attracts a young audience prized by advertisers and where YouTube dominates.

title: Investor who foresaw 2008 US home crisis closes hedge fund. Reason will surprise you
description: The investor has spent the past year warning about what he sees as bubbles in the market. He has sharply criticised big technology stocks and the boom in artificial intelligence (AI).
